description:
Have you found unreadable PEP8-compliant code and wondered how to fix
it? Have you ever seen code that was simply a pleasure to read?

If you've ever wondered what makes code easy to read, this talk is for
you.

During this talk we'll learn a number of techniques for refactoring code
to improve readability and maintainability.

We'll discuss:

-  whitespace
-  self-documenting code
-  modularity
-  expectation management

We'll end with a checklist for improving the readability of your own
code.
title: Readability Counts
